content.div:
Valentine's Day: the holiday which celebrates that warm and funny feeling you get in your tummy.

Real talk: for many of us, that "funny feeling" is just the wave of nausea and regret that comes from mixing wine with loneliness and discount chocolate.

That's cool. It's never too late to feel some warm and fuzzy feelings that won't give you a hangover -- and Justin Bieber can help. Our apologies, Beliebers, it's not what you're thinking.

You see Bieber spent his Feb. 14 with a six-year-old mega-fan named Avalanna Routh. They scarfed cupcakes and Sour Patch Kids, they played Candyland, they cuddled. Bieber even let Routh play with his hair. (And, he obvs. shared photos of all these activities via Twitter -- even labelling one pic of a big 'ol smooch the "BEST PART OF MY DAY." All the baby-sloth videos on the Interwebs couldn't make for a bigger cute overload.)

So how did Bieber wind up spending V-Day with a little girl he called "Mrs. Bieber" on Twitter? Shouldn't he be renting out the Rogers Centre for a very-special ping-pong date with Selena Gomez?

Since babyhood, Routh has battled a rare form of brain cancer, AT/RT, Us Weekly reports. That didn't stop her from "marrying" her idol last year. (Metro reports hospital staff threw Routh and a Bieber cut-out a wedding last year, complete with flowers, music and a cake.) And a Facebook campaign launched to help the little girl meet her "Mr." eventually caught Bieber's attention.

Come Monday, he'd flown Routh and her parents to New York, CNN reports, where they celebrated V-Day together.

"It was great...He wants to be my husband," Routh told CNN. And never doubt her Belieber cred. As the six-year-old told Us Weekly, she's been a fan for "Seven years. No, 80. Eighty years."

For his part, Bieber Tweeted about his time with Routh yesterday, saying: "That was one of the best things I have ever done. She was AWESOME! Feeling really inspired now! #MrsBieber."

Routh's mother, Aileen Routh, told CNN she was moved by the pop starâ€™s visit. "This is a beautiful story," she said, "and we need to keep the momentum going and we need to fund finding a cure for AT/RT."

leahc@dose.ca

link.Abstract: MuchMusic scored a holiday miracle when it convinced Stratford, Ont.’s Justin Bieber to come home for the holidays. It scored another when it managed to book Toronto’s historic Massey Hall — one of the city’s best-sounding venues known for classic live albums by Neil Young and Rush — for the special event.
link.title: TV Tonight: Justin Bieber - Home for the Holidays

link.Abstract: From Taylor Swift's big win to Justin Bieber in Zubaz pants, we're looking back at the most memorable moments of the evening.
link.title: Best and Worst Moments from the AMAs

link.Abstract: Justin Bieber isn't the first, and he isn't even the youngest. Check out some of our favourite examples of celebs who've dabbled in hip-hop.

entry.content: Watch Justin Bieber and Mariah Carey in their new video, "All I Want For Christmas Is You." Fair warning: Just like any other Xmas gift, you can't give this one back.

entry.title: Good News: Justin Bieber and Selena Gomez Aren't Getting Married; Bad News: He Still Doesn't Love You

link.Abstract: Justin Bieber and Selena Gomez have dismissed rumours that they're engaged. Gossip of an engagement began to spread when Gomez was photographed wearing a diamond ring.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Selena Gomez and Justin Bieber aren't getting married, everyone. They just own a lot of fabulous diamond jewelry.
link.title: Selena Gomez and Justin Bieber

link.Abstract: Selena Gomez! Lady Gaga! Coldplay! A dancing leprechaun! (Oops! That was actually Justin Bieber!) We've got pictures from the 2011 MTV Europe Music Awards, held Nov. 6 in Belfast, Ireland.
link.title: Photos: Inside the 2011 MTV Europe Music Awards

link.Abstract: How do you hold a moonbeam in your hand? You can't! And yet, Justin Bieber tries and tries and tries again. We've rounded up photos of the pop star's signature move -- the '90s boy-band air grab. Swoon!
link.title: Gallery: Justin Bieber's Signature Move

link.Abstract: It's a Nov. 23 miracle! Justin Bieber performed a concert of festive hits for The Today Show. Check out pictures of our favourite Christmas Elf and his special helper, Usher.
link.title: Photos: Justin Bieber Brings a Little Christmas to The Today Show

link.Abstract: A second Justin Bieber's "Santa Claus is Coming to Town" has arrived. Watch it here -- if only to puzzle over why the kid plays a cyborg, steampunk elf.
link.title: Justin Bieber Debuts (Another) Video For 'Santa Claus Is Coming to Town'

link.Abstract: Selena Gomez appeared on the Ellen Degeneres Show. The talk show host talked to Gomez about "what a crazy last two weeks it's been in the news," but it's unclear whether Gomez was commenting on the Justin Bieber paternity suit, or the several other things she's been caught up in recently. For instance, a man accused of stalking the pop star was set free Wednesday.
link.title: Selena Gomez Talks Justin Bieber Paternity Suit (Or Maybe Her Alleged Stalker?)

link.Abstract: Watch Justin Bieber and Mariah Carey in their new video, "All I Want For Christmas Is You." Fair warning: Just like any other Xmas gift, you can't give this one back.
link.title: Video: Justin Bieber and Mariah Carey Debut 'All I Want For Christmas,' The Gift That Keeps On Giving You Nightmares

link.Abstract: Selena Gomez is the life of the party -- whether it's in the club, or in a pumpkin patch -- in her new video "Hit the Lights." Watch it here.
link.title: Video: Selena Gomez Parties 'Til Dawn in 'Hit the Lights' (Is Somebody Celebrating Today's Bieber News?)

link.Abstract: Justin Bieber is auctioning his pet snake, Johnson, for charity.
link.title: For Sale: Justin Bieber's Snake

link.Abstract: Selena Gomez's accused stalker, 46-year-old Thomas Brodnicki, was ordered by a judge to stay a minimum of 100 yards away from Gomez, her family and assistant in an L.A. County court.
link.title: One Less Thing For Selena Gomez To Worry About; Pop Star Wins Restraining Order Against Alleged Stalker

link.Abstract: Teen sweethearts Justin Bieber and Selena Gomez took their relationship to the next level by become new parents…to a dog.
link.title: Justin Bieber and Selena Gomez Adopt Dog
